pages.text:
[Page Title: Cafe Roca]

Skip to content Cafe Roca is a reflection of the love we have for our community and our personal preferences in food, music and design. The often-changing menu is, where possible, locally sourced, with much of its influence from Latin, Asian and American culture. The space was designed and built by hand from found, salvaged, reclaimed and recycled building materials. Each song played through our speakers is hand-picked and updated daily. Our guiding principle is thoughtfulness, and our one collective hope is that, in some small way, we enrich the lives of our guests.
